description: Dashboard to visualize the Notifiarr Client metrics exported to Prometheus.

targets.expr: rate(notifiarr_client_integrations{app=~"$apps", name=~"POST Bytes Received|POST Bytes Sent|GET Bytes Received", instance=~"$instance", job=~"$job"}[2m])
notifiarr_client_integrations{app=~"$apps", name!~"POST Bytes Received|POST Bytes Sent|GET Bytes Received"}

title: Notifiarr Client
